text: Thomas White (10 November 1924 – 1998) was an English professional footballer who played as an inside forward for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:1998 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Association football inside forwards Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Worcester City F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Tom White (footballer, born 1924)
